dict.acceptation: 不能的，不会的；无能力的，不熟练的；不能胜任的；〈罕，诗〉弱，无力的；

sent.orig: Is unable to againstflow is truly the time, is unable to recover is truly the memory.
sent.trans: 真正无法逆行的是时光、真正无法追回的是记忆。

sent.orig: Unable to set the phone to flash mode. Unable to flash.
sent.trans: 无法设置手机到刷芯片模式，不能刷。

sent.orig: We are unable to travel on Saturday letter will follow. Unable travel saturday letter following.
sent.trans: 我们无法于星期六成行，详情将函告。

sent.orig: Packers would be unable to give better terms to big producers than to small ones.
sent.trans: 加工商无法再给大养殖主提供比小养殖主更加优惠的条件。

sent.orig: We regret that we are unable to meet your requirements.
sent.trans: 40很遗憾，我们无法满足你们的要求。
